metadata.description: Audio recording prompts for user evaluation data collection
metadata.purpose: Collect reference audio samples across Social, Travel, and Business categories

recording_instructions.good_speakers: Record natural, native-like responses with appropriate slang and regional markers. These serve as gold standard references.
recording_instructions.newbies: Record at your current level - mistakes are valuable data! Try to use vocabulary you know.

social.description: Personal interactions - friends, family, nightlife, emotions
social.slang_focus: Casual slang, Catalan expressions, friend terms (tío, nen, colega)

travel.description: Navigation, transportation, tourism, asking for directions
travel.slang_focus: Polite requests, common tourist situations, practical vocabulary

business.description: Professional settings - work, meetings, money, formal communication
business.slang_focus: Work slang (curro, plego), money slang (pasta, calés), professional register

beginner.situation: You see a friend at a cafe
beginner.prompt_text: Say hello and ask how they are
beginner.example_response: ¡Hola! ¿Qué tal? ¿Cómo estás?

beginner.situation: You're leaving a friend's house
beginner.prompt_text: Say goodbye and that you'll see them soon
beginner.example_response: Adiós. Hasta pronto. Nos vemos.

beginner.situation: Someone asks how you're feeling today
beginner.prompt_text: Say you're happy and doing well
beginner.example_response: Estoy bien. Estoy muy contento hoy.

beginner.situation: A friend asks what you want to do
beginner.prompt_text: Say you want to go to a restaurant
beginner.example_response: Quiero ir a un restaurante. ¿Vamos?

beginner.situation: Someone asks if you like the food
beginner.prompt_text: Say yes, you like it very much
beginner.example_response: Sí, me gusta mucho. Es muy bueno.

beginner.situation: You accidentally bump into someone
beginner.prompt_text: Apologize
beginner.example_response: Perdón. Lo siento mucho.

intermediate.situation: You run into a friend you haven't seen in a while on the street
intermediate.prompt_text: Greet them warmly and ask how things are going
intermediate.example_response: ¡Hola, tío! ¿Qué tal todo? Hace tiempo que no te veo, ¿cómo va?

intermediate.situation: Leaving a bar after drinks with friends
intermediate.prompt_text: Say goodbye warmly, mention you had a great time
intermediate.example_response: Venga, tío, nos vemos. Ha molado mucho. Luego hablamos, ¿vale?

intermediate.situation: Your friend tells you they got a new job
intermediate.prompt_text: Express excitement and happiness for them
intermediate.example_response: ¡Qué guay! Me alegro mucho por ti. ¡Eso mola un montón!

intermediate.situation: You want to invite friends out this weekend
intermediate.prompt_text: Suggest going out Saturday night
intermediate.example_response: ¿Quedamos el sábado? Podemos ir de cañas y luego salir de fiesta.

intermediate.situation: Friend recommends a restaurant, you agree
intermediate.prompt_text: Express agreement and add why you like it
intermediate.example_response: Tal cual, ese sitio mola mucho. La comida está genial y no es caro.

intermediate.situation: Friend tells you surprising gossip
intermediate.prompt_text: React with surprise
intermediate.example_response: ¡No me digas! ¿En serio? ¡Qué fuerte, tío! No me lo creo.

intermediate.situation: Friend asks about last night's party
intermediate.prompt_text: Describe that it was great but now you're hungover
intermediate.example_response: ¡La fiesta estuvo genial! Pero hoy tengo una resaca brutal, tío.

intermediate.situation: You arrive 15 minutes late to meet friends
intermediate.prompt_text: Apologize and briefly explain
intermediate.example_response: Perdona, tío, lo siento mucho. El metro iba fatal y me he retrasado.

advanced.situation: You bump into an old friend from Barcelona on the street
advanced.prompt_text: Greet them enthusiastically with regional expressions
advanced.example_response: Ei, nen! Què tal? Fa temps que no et veig! Com va tot, home?

advanced.situation: Saying goodbye after a great night out
advanced.prompt_text: Say goodbye warmly with regional expressions
advanced.example_response: Vinga, apa! Ha sigut genial. Ens veiem la setmana que ve. Cuida't!

advanced.situation: Your friend shares amazing news
advanced.example_response: Quina passada! He flipat! Me alegro mogollón por ti, tío. Brutal!

advanced.situation: You're exhausted after a long week
advanced.example_response: Estic mort, tío. Quina mandra de fer res avui. Necessito descansar.

advanced.situation: Organizing weekend plans with friends
advanced.example_response: Quedem dissabte? Podem anar a fer el vermut i després sortir de festa al Raval.

advanced.situation: Friend asks if you want to party tonight
advanced.example_response: Vinga va, ens la fotem avui? Sí, home, estic molt per labor!

advanced.situation: Someone says something you strongly disagree with
advanced.example_response: Ni de conya, tío! Això no és veritat. De debò penses això?

advanced.situation: Friend tells you unbelievable news
advanced.example_response: Hòstia! De debò? Ni de conya, tía! Que fort això! He flipat!

advanced.situation: Describing last night's party to a friend
advanced.prompt_text: Tell them about the great night
advanced.example_response: Tío, la festa ho va petar! Vaig anar torrat a casa. Avui tinc una resaca brutal.

advanced.situation: Inviting someone to go out drinking
advanced.example_response: Escolta, anem a fer el vermut? Conec un bar genial al Born. Després podem anar de copes.

advanced.situation: You forgot a friend's birthday
advanced.example_response: Hòstia, perdona! L'he cagat totalment. De debò ho sento molt.

beginner.situation: You're lost and need to find a street
beginner.prompt_text: Ask someone where the street is
beginner.example_response: Perdone, ¿dónde está la calle Mayor?

beginner.situation: You need to find the train station
beginner.prompt_text: Ask how to get to the train station
beginner.example_response: Por favor, ¿cómo llego a la estación de tren?

beginner.situation: You want to buy a metro ticket
beginner.prompt_text: Ask for a metro ticket
beginner.example_response: Un billete de metro, por favor. ¿Cuánto cuesta?

beginner.situation: You're on a bus and need to know where to get off
beginner.prompt_text: Ask which stop is for the beach
beginner.example_response: Perdone, ¿qué parada es para la playa?

beginner.situation: You arrive at a hotel
beginner.prompt_text: Say you have a reservation
beginner.example_response: Hola, tengo una reserva. Mi nombre es...

beginner.situation: At a restaurant, you want to order
beginner.prompt_text: Order water and ask for the menu
beginner.example_response: Agua, por favor. ¿Tiene el menú?

beginner.situation: You want to pay the bill
beginner.prompt_text: Ask for the bill
beginner.example_response: La cuenta, por favor.

beginner.situation: You need help urgently
beginner.prompt_text: Ask for help
beginner.example_response: ¡Ayuda, por favor! Necesito ayuda.

intermediate.situation: You're looking for a famous landmark in Barcelona
intermediate.prompt_text: Ask how to get to the Sagrada Familia
intermediate.example_response: Oye, perdona, ¿sabes cómo llego a la Sagrada Familia? ¿Está lejos de aquí?

intermediate.situation: Someone gives you directions but you don't understand
intermediate.prompt_text: Ask them to repeat more slowly
intermediate.example_response: Perdona, no he pillado. ¿Puedes repetir más despacio?

intermediate.situation: Your train is delayed and you need information
intermediate.prompt_text: Ask when the next train leaves
intermediate.example_response: Perdone, ¿a qué hora sale el próximo tren? Es que el mío lleva retraso.

intermediate.situation: You need to take a taxi
intermediate.prompt_text: Tell the driver where you're going and ask how long it takes
intermediate.example_response: Hola, al aeropuerto, por favor. ¿Cuánto se tarda más o menos?

intermediate.situation: There's a problem with your hotel room
intermediate.prompt_text: Explain the AC doesn't work
intermediate.example_response: Perdone, hay un problema. El aire acondicionado no funciona. ¿Pueden arreglarlo?

intermediate.situation: Ordering food at a Barcelona restaurant
intermediate.prompt_text: Order a local dish and ask for a recommendation
intermediate.example_response: ¿Qué me recomiendas? Me apetece algo típico de aquí. ¿Las tapas están buenas?

intermediate.situation: The food is taking too long
intermediate.prompt_text: Politely ask about your order
intermediate.example_response: Perdona, llevamos un rato esperando. ¿Sabes si falta mucho para la comida?

intermediate.situation: You lost your wallet
intermediate.prompt_text: Report it and ask for help
intermediate.example_response: Oye, perdona, me han robado la cartera. ¿Dónde está la comisaría más cercana?

advanced.situation: You're in Barcelona and someone asks you for directions
advanced.prompt_text: Give directions to Las Ramblas like a local
advanced.example_response: Mira, vas tot recte fins al final i gires a l'esquerra. És molt fàcil, nen, no té pèrdua.

advanced.situation: Friend asks for the best route somewhere
advanced.prompt_text: Recommend a shortcut with local knowledge
advanced.example_response: Home, no vagis per allà, hi ha molta penya. Agafa el carreró del costat, és més ràpid.

advanced.situation: Complaining about Barcelona public transport
advanced.prompt_text: Tell a friend about your commute problems
advanced.example_response: Tío, el metro anava fatal avui. Vaig trigar una hora en arribar. Quina ràbia!

advanced.situation: Negotiating with a taxi driver
advanced.prompt_text: Ask for a fixed price and negotiate
advanced.example_response: Escolta, ¿cuánto me cobras hasta el aeropuerto? Es que con el taxímetro sale carísimo.

advanced.situation: Checking out of a hotel and giving feedback
advanced.prompt_text: Say goodbye and comment on your stay
advanced.example_response: Moltes gràcies per tot. L'estada ha estat genial. L'única pega és que el matalàs era una mica dur.

advanced.situation: At a traditional Barcelona bar ordering vermut
advanced.prompt_text: Order like a local at a vermouth bar
advanced.example_response: Poseu-me un vermut amb olives i anxoves. Ah, i unes patates braves si en teniu.

advanced.situation: Recommending a restaurant to a tourist
advanced.example_response: Home, no vagis als llocs turístics. Conec un bar genial al Poblenou. Les tapes ho peten!

advanced.situation: Your friend got hurt and you need to explain to a doctor
advanced.example_response: Miri, el meu amic ha caigut i s'ha fet mal al peu. Li fa molt de mal i no pot caminar.

beginner.situation: Meeting a colleague for the first time
beginner.prompt_text: Introduce yourself formally
beginner.example_response: Buenos días. Soy María. Encantada de conocerle.

beginner.situation: Entering an office for a meeting
beginner.prompt_text: Greet and say you have a meeting
beginner.example_response: Buenos días. Tengo una reunión con el señor García.

beginner.situation: Someone asks what you do for work
beginner.prompt_text: Say your profession
beginner.example_response: Trabajo en una empresa. Soy programador.

beginner.situation: Your colleague asks how work is going
beginner.prompt_text: Say you're busy
beginner.example_response: Estoy muy ocupado hoy. Tengo mucho trabajo.

beginner.situation: You need a document from a colleague
beginner.prompt_text: Ask for it politely
beginner.example_response: ¿Puede enviarme el documento, por favor?

beginner.situation: Asking about price in a shop
beginner.prompt_text: Ask how much something costs
beginner.example_response: ¿Cuánto cuesta esto? ¿Aceptan tarjeta?

intermediate.situation: Chatting with colleagues about the workday
intermediate.prompt_text: Talk about how busy work has been
intermediate.example_response: Menudo día llevo en el curro. No he parado ni un momento. Estoy hasta arriba.

intermediate.situation: Telling a friend about your job
intermediate.prompt_text: Describe your work hours and commute
intermediate.example_response: Entro a las nueve y plego a las seis. El curro está lejos, tardo una hora en llegar.

intermediate.situation: You can't attend a meeting
intermediate.prompt_text: Apologize and ask to reschedule
intermediate.example_response: Perdona, no puedo ir a la reunión mañana. Tengo un marrón con otro proyecto. ¿La podemos mover?

intermediate.situation: Giving your opinion in a work meeting
intermediate.prompt_text: Politely disagree with a proposal
intermediate.example_response: En plan, entiendo lo que dices, pero no me acaba de convencer. ¿Y si probamos otra cosa?

intermediate.situation: Discussing finances with a friend
intermediate.prompt_text: Say you're saving money for something
intermediate.example_response: Estoy ahorrando pasta para las vacaciones. Este mes voy justo de dinero.

intermediate.situation: Colleague asks to borrow money
intermediate.prompt_text: Explain you're broke this month
intermediate.example_response: Lo siento, tío, estoy pelado hasta fin de mes. El alquiler me ha dejado tieso.

intermediate.situation: Asking your boss for a day off
intermediate.prompt_text: Make the request politely
intermediate.example_response: Perdona, ¿podría cogerme el viernes libre? Es que tengo un tema personal.

intermediate.situation: It's Friday afternoon
intermediate.prompt_text: Say goodbye to colleagues for the weekend
intermediate.example_response: Venga, me piro que ya es viernes. Buen finde a todos. Luego nos vemos.

advanced.situation: Complaining about work stress to a friend
advanced.example_response: Tío, el curro m'està matant. Porto setmanes sense plegar abans de les vuit. Estic rebentat.

advanced.situation: Telling someone about quitting your job
advanced.example_response: Vaig plegar perquè el cap era insuportable. A més, no em pagaven prou. Quina ràbia de feina!

advanced.situation: Discussing the cost of living in Barcelona
advanced.example_response: Home, Barcelona és caríssima. Els lloguers van pels núvols. No tinc calés ni per sortir.

advanced.situation: Friend asks if you can lend them money
advanced.example_response: Escolta, ara mateix estic pelat. M'han arribat un munt de factures i estic molt just de pasta.

advanced.situation: A meeting is going badly
advanced.prompt_text: Express frustration to a colleague afterward
advanced.example_response: Quina reunió més inútil, tío. Hem perdut dues hores i no hem decidit res. Quina ràbia!

advanced.situation: You have a good idea to share in a meeting
advanced.example_response: Escolta, tinc una idea que pot funcionar. I si ho fem així? Crec que seria més eficient.

advanced.situation: Asking for a raise
advanced.prompt_text: Make your case to your boss
advanced.example_response: Miri, porto aquí tres anys i crec que em mereixo una pujada. La meva feina ha millorat molt.

advanced.situation: Networking at a professional event in Barcelona
advanced.example_response: Hola, sóc el Marc, de l'empresa TechBarcelona. Encantat. Què tal? Vosaltres a què us dediqueu?

session_1_newbies_all_beginner.description: All newbies record beginner prompts across all 3 categories
session_1_newbies_all_beginner.instructions: Focus on clear pronunciation. Mistakes are okay and valuable data!

session_2_newbies_intermediate.description: Newbies attempt intermediate prompts (as many as comfortable)
session_2_newbies_intermediate.instructions: Try to incorporate slang words. Don't worry if it feels unnatural.

session_3_good_speakers.description: Good speakers record ALL prompts as gold standard
session_3_good_speakers.prompts: ALL prompts from all 3 categories and all levels
session_3_good_speakers.instructions: Record naturally with all slang and regional markers. These are the reference recordings.

evaluation_notes.comparison_strategy: Compare newbie recordings to good speaker recordings for same prompts

category_specific_focus.social: Natural slang usage, emotional expression, casual register
category_specific_focus.travel: Clear communication, polite requests, practical vocabulary
category_specific_focus.business: Professional register, work slang (curro, plego), money vocabulary
